H0.text: What is the study of armorial bearings called. Symbology

H1.text: What is the study of armorial bearings called. Vexillology

H2.text: What is the study of armorial bearings called. Sigillography

H3.text: What is the study of armorial bearings called. Heraldry

A4.text: Heraldry (also known as armory) is a discipline relating to the design, display, study and transmission of armorial bearings.
